description.fr: {%COMPANION_APPEARANCE} Confère son {%AT} en {%AR} à votre héros.
description.en: {%COMPANION_APPEARANCE} Confers their {%AT} on your hero as {%AR}.
description.es: {%COMPANION_APPEARANCE} Confiere su {%AT} en {%AR} a tu héroe.
description.pt: {%COMPANION_APPEARANCE} Concede seu {%AT} em {%AR} ao seu herói.

bgDescription.fr: Ouvrez grand les yeux et voyez ce qui se profile devant vous... Essayez de deviner, au moins...
bgDescription.en: Open your eyes wide and see what's right in front of you… Try to guess, at least…
bgDescription.es: Abre bien los ojos y averigua lo que se vislumbra en el horizonte… O trata de adivinarlo, por lo menos…
bgDescription.de: Mach die Augen weit auf und sieh, was sich vor dir abzeichnet ... Versuche wenigstens, es zu erraten …
bgDescription.pt: Abra bem os olhos e vislumbre o que o futuro reserva para você… Ou tente adivinhar, pelo menos…
